title: You Have to See Kylie Jenner’s Insane Madonna Halloween Costume
text:
From Cosmopolitan

Kylie Jenner just debuted her first Halloween costume of 2019!

She dressed as Madonna at the 2003 VMAs, and her BFF Stassie Karanikolaou dressed as Britney Spears.

Halloween 2019 is upon us and so far celebs have been going for it with their costumes: Demi Lovato did a terrifying Pennywise that will surely haunt my dreams, Jessica Biel dressed as Justin Timberlake in *NSYNC (lol), and Halsey and Evan Peters decided to go public with their relationship by wearing a couple's costume.

But Kylie Jenner, queen of Halloween costumes, is only just warming up, and debuted her first costume of the week—which I think we can all safely assume will be one of many—last night. Kylie dressed as Madonna at the 2003 VMAs, aka the year that the singer famously kissed Britney Spears and Christina Aguilera on stage at the awards show. And Ky really committed to the costume (as we all knew that she would) with a mic, top hat, and blonde wig. She also had her BFF Stassie Karanikolaou dressed at Britney Spears, and the two filmed a little tribute to the pop stars' iconic performance by dancing around to "Like a Virgin" and kissing:

And reminder: these two got matching eye surgery together earlier this week, so pecking for a Halloween costume is hardly the most intimate thing that they've done together!!

Kylie only posted a brief Insta story of the outfit, so it seems like it's not her main Halloween costume of the year. And while I'm 100% going to be stalking Kylie's Instagram for the rest of the week to see what else she dresses up as, I gotta be honest: I'm way more excited to see Stormi's costume.

You Might Also Like
description: She even has a prop mic! 😂
